name: Through the Sky (Prototype)
description:
Here is my entry and prototype it took me a while to figure out the new input system. 

This is a simple obstacle course where your goal is get to the end of the course without falling into the water. 

Controls: 

Used WASD and spacebar to move 

Constantly press WAS or D to gain momentum, but don’t touch the clouds or the red blocks. 

Note: there is a bug that I try to incorporate into the gameplay to give multiple ways to get to the end even if some are a little easy. 

Hope you enjoy!
